thread.title: My father rose from the dead to vote, claims Azmin
thread.title_full: My father rose from the dead to vote, claims Azmin

title: My father rose from the dead to vote, claims Azmin

organizations.name: azmin more  selangor menteri besar azmin ali

text:
More 
Selangor Menteri Besar Azmin Ali has decribed the electoral roll as not clean, and claimed that it showed his father “rose from the dead” to vote in 2004. 
Testifying in the High Court in Kuala Lumpur today, the PKR deputy president said his father had passed away in 1999, but his name appeared on the electoral roll in the 2004 general election. 
"Unfortunately, I did not meet him (the father)," he quipped when replying to a question from lawyer Sivarasa Rasiah. 
Azmin was testifying as a witness in the defamation trial involving former opposition leader Anwar Ibrahim and Youth and Sports Minister Khairy Jamaluddin.
